item.title: [InsidiaX Pi] Double Hit
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

i want to make a weapon double hit i searched in combatassistant.java and found this at the dbow:

if (damage2 != -1) { int [] rangeDouble = {11235}; for (int j = 0; j < rangeDouble.length; j++) { if (damage2 != -1 && rangeDouble[j] == c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) { //Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerLevel[3] -= damage2; Server.playerHandler.players[i].CIcon = 1; Server.playerHandler.players[i].dealDamage(damage2); Server.playerHandler.players[i].damageTaken[c.playerId] += damage2; Server.playerHandler.players[i].handleHitMask(damage2);
